pages.text: $(li)The Dragon Breath is an essencial ingredient for potions.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to transform $(l)Splash Potions$() into $(l)Lingering Potions$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).

$(li)It can be used to craft an $(l:patchouli:decoration/charm/lanterns)Acidian Lantern$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/lingering_water_bottle)Lingering Potion Bottles$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)The Dragon's Breath can be only obtained by scooping up the Ender Dragon's breath attack or the purple effect clouds caused by they fireballs in an empty $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/glass_bottle)Glass Bottle$(/l).
